varu#NOq&dBiH sAmnEq sama#namadRuqcE sama#namaqdyathAq sAmaqrcA brahma#NEq sama#namat kShaqtrAyaq sama#namaqdyathAq brahma# kShaqtrENaq rAj~jEq sama#namad-viqSE sama#namaqdyathAq rAjA# viqSA rathA#yaqH sama#namaqdaSvE$ByaqH sama#namaqdyathAq rathO&Svai$H praqjApa#tayEq sama#namad-BUqtEByaqH sama#namaqdyathA$ praqjApa#tirBUqtaiH saqmana#madEqvaM mahya#M ( ) BaqdrAH saMna#tayaqH saM na#mantu || 51
(aqdByaH sama#namaqdyathAq-mahya#M-caqtvAri# ca) (A23)
